main event: A witness observed an unidentified object with erratic motion, changing brightness and shape, in Dayton, Ohio on May 15, 2002.
interesting points: The object was silver and gold in color.
The object disappeared beyond some trees.
The witness was located 15 miles from Vandalia.
There was insufficient data to conclusively evaluate the sighting.
sighted object: a silver and gold object with erratic motion and changing brightness/shape
